ee mangin danata ema panatha yatathe athadanguwata pathwa rajya nayakayan ghathanaya, aagamika siddhasthanawalata paharadima, siyaganan siwil wasiyan maradamima aadiya sandaha danduwam laba sitina siyaluma thrasthawadinta nidahasa labenu atha.

rajya ha ardha rajya anshaye sewa niyukthikayan pilibandawa mul warata widyathmaka sangananayak pawathwana ladde 1980 warshaye wana athara in pasu piliwalin 1985, 1990, 1994, 1998, 2002, 2006, saha 2016 yana warshawaladi mema sangananaya pawathwa atha. 1980 warshayata perada mema sangananaya pawathwa athi namuth eya rajya paripalana amathyanshaya wisin watup lekhana padanam karaganimin rajya anshaye sewa niyukthikayan pilibanda ganan ganimak lesa sidu kara atha. 2016 nowambar masa 17 dina pawathwana lada mema sangananayata anuwa rajya ha ardha rajya anshaye mulu sewa niyukthikayin sankhyawa 1,109,475 wana athara mema sankhyawa thula shri lanka yuddha hamudawa, nawika hamudawa ha guwan hamudawa thula sitina nila andum darana karya mandalaya athulath nowe.
